Detailed Description

cvmx_xsx_smt::_p::_src::_rdwt

These registers specify the arbitration weights used when accepting read requests. Each input source is assigned an arbitration weight, and weights are programmed separately for each of the eight memory tiles (SMT(0..7)).

The MHABs are connected via port 0 (P(0)). Sources 0-5 represent the 6 GHABs, and source 6 is PNB0.

The MDABs are connected via port 1 (P(1)). Sources 0-5 are the 6 GDABs, and source 6 is PNB1.
